data.name: 0000 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: So I brought them some tea.

data.name: 0001 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Everyone in the Computer Society was really pleased…

data.name: 0002 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru!

data.name: 0003 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yes?

data.name: 0004 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Good job!

data.name: 0005 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huh…?

data.name: 0006 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: First you use your loving smile to get close and lower their defences…

data.name: 0007 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Doing so lets you jump in and gradually destroy them from the inside…

data.name: 0008 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That way you can avoid unnecessary fighting and stuff.

data.name: 0009 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: As long as they can be friendly with you, I'm sure they'll be satisfied, right, Mikuru?

data.name: 0010 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: H-huhhh?!

data.name: 0011 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's a strategy that makes the best use of our…

data.name: 0012 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …ultimate moe character Mikuru's allure.

data.name: 0013 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I wasn't really trying to d—

data.name: 0014 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's a pretty high level strategy for you to come up with, Mikuru.

data.name: 0015 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: These must be the fruits of my training!

data.name: 0016 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: S-Suzumiya, I was only trying to serve them tea…

data.name: 0017 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's fine, you don't have to be so modest.

data.name: 0018 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I always knew you had the talent in you, Mikuru.

data.name: 0019 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: T-talent?

data.name: 0020 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What do you call it? An enchantress?

data.name: 0021 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: W-what's an enchantress?!

data.name: 0022 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru, you're small and cute—it makes people want to protect you!

data.name: 0023 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's the kind of feeling, right?

data.name: 0024 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's exactly what enchants men and allows you to control them, basically.

data.name: 0025 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: S-Suzumiya, what kind of impression do you have of me?!

data.name: 0026 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I don't want you to think of me like that!

data.name: 0027 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What are you crying about? It's no big deal.

data.name: 0028 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It would be more of a sin not to use your god-given charm.

data.name: 0029 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeek—

data.name: 0030 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well now…

data.name: 0031 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Aside from Mikuru enchanting the members of the Computer Society…

data.name: 0032 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huhh?! Please don't change the story to your will!

data.name: 0033 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's right, maybe we should continue to put other clubs under our control?

data.name: 0034 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What do you think, Mikuru?

data.name: 0035 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I think we should start with the baseball club, right?

data.name: 0036 (004.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm telling you I can't do that!

data.name: 0037 (004.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm just kidding, Mikuru.
